scripts.start:fresh: git checkout --orphan new-branch && git add -A && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
scripts.build:all: yarn build:core && yarn build:packages && yarn build:demo
scripts.build:packages: yarn workspace @persistx/validator-zod build && yarn workspace @persistx/adapter-firestore build && yarn workspace @persistx/cli build
scripts.clean:packages: find packages -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find packages -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -type f -delete && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean && yarn clean:packages && yarn clean:demo
scripts.clean:nuclear: rm -rf node_modules dist coverage .yarn/cache .yarn/install-state.gz yarn.lock packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo demo-vite-app/node_modules demo-vite-app/dist
scripts.fresh: yarn clean:nuclear && yarn install && yarn build:all
scripts.release:check: yarn clean && yarn install && yarn build:all && yarn test
scripts.release:publish: yarn npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish -w @persistx/core && yarn npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish -w @persistx/validator-zod && yarn npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish -w @persistx/adapter-firestore && yarn npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish -w @persistx/cli
